name: BOM List
query:
select

b.name,
b.item as "Item",
b.item_name as "Item Name",
b.company as "Company",
b.weight_per_unit as "Weight Per Unit",
b.price_category as "Price Categoy",
b.weight_uom as "Weight UOM",
if(b.is_active=1 ,"Active", "Deactive") as "Status",
b.uom as "Item UOM",
b.quantity as "Quantity",
b.currency as "Currency",
b.rm_cost_as_per as "Rate Of Materials Based On",
if(b.with_operations=1 ,"Yes", "No") as "With Operations",
if(b.inspection_required=1 ,"Yes","No") as "Inspection Required",

bi.item_code as "Item Code",
bi.item_name as "Item Name",
bi.operation as "Operation",
bi.bom_no as "BOM No" ,
bi.description as "Item Description",
bi.net_qty as "Net QTY",
bi.qty as "Gross Qty",
bi.uom as "UOM",
bi.rate as "Rate:Currency",
bi.amount as "Amount:Currency",
b.operating_cost as "Operation Cost:Currency",
b.raw_material_cost as "Raw Material Cost:Currency",
b.total_cost as "Total Cost:Currency",
b.raw_material_cost as "Scrap Material Cost (INR):Currency"



from `tabBOM` b ,`tabBOM Item` bi 
where bi.parent=b.name and
b.company=%(company)s
